title: Pixel 5 Camera app is only working on selfie mode (rear camera showing black).
content:
On March 28, 2021 Camera app suddenly stopped working for rear camera, only selfie camera works but app is crashing/freezing after few seconds anyway. IÂ´ve tried:
- uninstalling updates on Camera, Chrome and Android system WebView
- many restart and booting into safe mode
- restore phone

None of the above is working. Pixel 5 phone is brand new and camera was working just fine 2 days ago. This looks like software issue. Can you please look into this?
